formalpara.title: Internal help for this application in Asterisk 1.4:

para.screen:
-= Info about application 'SIPAddHeader' =-
[Synopsis] Add a SIP header to the outbound call
[Description] SIPAddHeader(Header: Content) Adds a header to a SIP call placed with DIAL. Remember to user the X-header if you are adding non-standard SIP headers, like "X-Asterisk-Accountcode:". Use this with care. Adding the wrong headers may jeopardize the SIP dialog. Always returns 0

formalpara.title: Diff of the internal help from Asterisk 1.2 to 1.4:
Diff of the internal help from Asterisk 1.4 to 1.6:

para.screen:
--- in Asterisk 1.4 +++ in Asterisk 1.6 @@ -4,7 +4,7 @@ Add a SIP header to the outbound call
[Description] - SIPAddHeader(Header: Content) + SIPAddHeader(Header: Content): Adds a header to a SIP call placed with DIAL. Remember to user the X-header if you are adding non-standard SIP headers, like "X-Asterisk-Accountcode:". Use this with care.
